name: pod-o-lee-website
description: Website of dormitory club Pod-O-Lee: https://pod.cvut.cz

scripts.dev: git submodule update --init --recursive && sh scripts/fetch_contacts.sh && hugo server --disableFastRender --navigateToChanged --ignoreCache --verbose --bind='0.0.0.0' --path-warnings --i18n-warnings --templateMetricsHints

author: Jan Picka (j.picka@pod.cvut.cz)
